You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(ggvis)
ggvis(cars, x= ~speed, y = ~dist) %>%
  layer_points() %>%
  add_tooltip( function(x) {
    paste('Speed:',x$speed, '<br />',
          'Distance: ', x$dist)
  }, 'hover') %>%
  add_axis('x', title = 'Speed (mph)') %>%
  add_axis('y', title = 'Stopping distance (ft)')
```
